facts: In memorial to W.A. Alexander, the Jackets football coach for many years who led the team to the Rose Bowl in 1928. W.A. Alexander was Tech's second Athletic Director and football coach, after Heisman.

facts: Tech football coach Bobby Dodd is a member of the national Football Hall of Fame. He led the Yellow Jackets to a 165-64-8 record from 1945-1966.

facts: This building was originally the Georgia Tech Infirmary.  The building was given its name in a dedication ceremony on May 22, l987 to honor Lloyd W. Chapin, whose career at Georgia Tech spanned 35 years from 1923-1958 as Professor of English, Registrar, and Dean of Faculties.
name: Chapin Building
